content: this is a summary of a civil case in telšiai district court the case involves a divorce between two parties referred to as the applicant and the defendant the court has made a final decision regarding the division of matrimonial property the defendant is responsible for paying €9275 for the stamp duty while the plaintiff has to pay €31025 for the stamp duty and €19500 for professional fees the court has ordered the applicant to pay the defendant a compensation of eur 1081772 for their share of the immovable property the applicant is also required to pay the defendant a compensation of eur 1500 which reduces the community property of the spouses the court has determined that the purchase contract for a property was a sham and the property belongs to both parties the defendants rights to the property have been annulled the court has also decided to divide the property between the parties awarding the plaintiff with the property and ordering the defendant to pay compensation the value of the property has been determined based on market prices and the court will consider valuation reports to determine the final value the court has evaluated the valuation of the property to be eur 27000 considering renovation expenses and personal contributions the court has also addressed the compensation for a car that was sold without consent and the fulfillment of creditors obligations the court has ordered the division of the property and the payment of compensation additionally the court has determined the payment of costs and stamp duties for both parties involved
